pages.text: The Ritual of Reparare mends damaged items stored in an inventory above the ritual stone. Place a chest directly above the master ritual stone and items within will slowly repair.

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 5,000 LP$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() Per durability point repaired (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Repair Rate:$() 20% of max durability per cycle$(br)$(bold)Interval:$() Every 5 seconds (configurable)

pages.title: Setup
pages.text: $(bold)Inventory:$() Place any container with item capability directly above the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(bold)Blacklist:$() Items tagged with $(thing)animus:disallow_repair$() will be skipped.$(br2)$(italic)What blood breaks, blood can mend.$()
